titles.title: Interagency Committee on Women's Business Enterprise Act of 2020
Interagency Committee on Women’s Business Enterprise Act of 2020
A bill to reauthorize the Interagency Committee on Women's Business Enterprise, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Interagency Committee on Women's Business Enterprise Act of 2020
This bill revises the duties, membership, and reporting requirements of the Interagency Committee on Women's Business Enterprise.
